attributes.action: Don't replace money with vouchers for the disabled on PIP
attributes.additional_details: Because its wrong and its heartless to target the disabled for having conditions through no fault of the own, no one asks for physical health disability and no one asks for anxiety and depression the govement has no compassion for the sick.
attributes.background: Don't take away our money and don't strip the disabled off the much needed finances.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/660984
